nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Ahsoka in Action!
The Clone Wars: Ahsoka in Action! is a Level One DK Readers children's book written by Jon Richards and released on December 17, 2012.

Filled with amazing action shots and pictures from Star Wars: The Clone Wars, this all-new DK Reader is an out-of-this-world read. Learn all about Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano and her action-packed adventures with the other characters from the Clone Wars universe. Written with the youngest readers in mind, this Pre-Level 1 reader features simple text, picture word strips, a picture glossary, and labels to introduce and reinforce vocabulary.
[[Category:The Clone Wars young readers|Ahsoka in Action!}}
